title: Low priority queue glitch??
body:
so i've played at least 3 games with low priority queue and i don't know how to get it removed can someone help?
5

replies.body: dude the same thing is happening to me..

Generally, LPQ is placed for 5 games. It *should* if I remember right be telling you how many games remaining at the top right of the client.

Keep in mind only matchmade games count (PvP, PvAI) but not bots/tutorials.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Fg2wieQH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-10T02:03:20.788+0000)
>
> Generally, LPQ is placed for 5 games. It *should* if I remember right be telling you how many games remaining at the top right of the client.
> 
> Keep in mind only matchmade games count (PvP, PvAI) but not bots/tutorials.

I think you mean *custom*/tutorials don't count, since PvAI games are usually called bot games.
